# The `LiveRegUnits` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A set of register units used to track register liveness. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::LiveRegUnits</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

A set of register units used to track register liveness.

Definition at line 30 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveregunits-h">LiveRegUnits.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### accumulate() {#af7ea64c95b144306f76693d958be9741}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void LiveRegUnits::accumulate (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; MI)</>}>
Adds all register units used, defined or clobbered in <code>MI</code>.

This is useful when walking over a range of instruction to find registers unused over the whole range.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveregunits-h/#l00132">132</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveregunits-h">LiveRegUnits.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveregunits-cpp/#l00069">69</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveregunits-cpp">LiveRegUnits.cpp</a>.

### addLiveOuts() {#ab4fff7ad3de452b1b1d20de5afd986a3}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void LiveRegUnits::addLiveOuts (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB)</>}>
Adds registers living out of block <code>MBB</code>.

Live out registers are the union of the live-in registers of the successor blocks and pristine registers. Live out registers of the end block are the callee saved registers.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveregunits-h/#l00138">138</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveregunits-h">LiveRegUnits.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveregunits-cpp/#l00138">138</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveregunits-cpp">LiveRegUnits.cpp</a>.

### stepBackward() {#aa5fb273566c37fdc7da88a0fec5a554c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void LiveRegUnits::stepBackward (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; MI)</>}>
Updates liveness when stepping backwards over the instruction <code>MI</code>.

This removes all register units defined or clobbered in <code>MI</code> and then adds the units used (as in use operands) in <code>MI</code>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveregunits-h/#l00127">127</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveregunits-h">LiveRegUnits.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveregunits-cpp/#l00044">44</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveregunits-cpp">LiveRegUnits.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

<SectionDefinition>

## Private Member Functions

### addPristines() {#a98b68639feabfee1c94d16d3d6a105bd}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void LiveRegUnits::addPristines (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF)</>}>
Adds pristine registers.

Pristine registers are callee saved registers that are unused in the function.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveregunits-h/#l00159">159</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveregunits-h">LiveRegUnits.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveregunits-cpp/#l00111">111</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveregunits-cpp">LiveRegUnits.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

## Public Static Functions

### accumulateUsedDefed() {#a06c3c14971a6414e21bf3a0a2652de0f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static void llvm::LiveRegUnits::accumulateUsedDefed (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; MI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveregunits">LiveRegUnits</a> &amp; ModifiedRegUnits, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveregunits">LiveRegUnits</a> &amp; UsedRegUnits, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo">TargetRegisterInfo</a> &#42; TRI)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
For a machine instruction <code>MI</code>, adds all register units used in <code>UsedRegUnits</code> and defined or clobbered in <code>ModifiedRegUnits</code>.

This is useful when walking over a range of instructions to track registers used or defined separately.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveregunits-h/#l00047">47</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveregunits-h">LiveRegUnits.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
